task.name: exportfits
task.shortdescription: Convert a CASA image to a FITS file
task.description: CASA-produced images can be exported as FITS files for transporting to other software packages or publication. No subimaging of the fits image can be made with this task. The spectral reference frame can be changed prior to export using the task imreframe.

param.name: imagename
param.description:
Name of input CASA image Default: none
Example: fitsimage='3C273XC1.image'

param.name: fitsimage
param.shortdescription: Name of output image FITS file
param.description:
Name of output image FITS file Default: none
Example: fitsimage='3C273XC1.fits'

param.name: velocity
param.shortdescription: Use velocity (rather than frequency) as spectral axis
param.description: Use velocity (rather than frequency) as spectral axis Default: False Options: False|True

param.name: optical
param.shortdescription: Use the optical (rather than radio) velocity convention
param.description: Use the optical (rather than radio) velocity convention Default: False Options: False|True

param.name: bitpix
param.description:
Bits per pixel Default: -32
Example: bitpix=16

param.name: minpix
param.shortdescription: Minimum pixel value (if minpix > maxpix, value is automatically determined)
param.description: Minimum pixel value (if minpix > maxpix, value is automatically determined)

param.name: maxpix
param.shortdescription: Maximum pixel value (if minpix > maxpix, value is automatically determined)
param.description: Maximum pixel value (if minpix > maxpix, value is automatically determined) Default: -1

param.name: overwrite
param.shortdescription: Overwrite output file if it exists?
param.description: Overwrite output file if it exists? Default: False Options: False|True

input.param: Drop the Stokes axis? Drop the Stokes axis? Default: False Options: False|True False

param.name: stokeslast
param.shortdescription: Put Stokes axis last in header?
param.description: Put Stokes axis last in header? Default: True Options: True|False

param.name: history
param.shortdescription: Write history to the FITS image?
param.description: Write history to the FITS image? Default: True Options: True|False

param.name: dropdeg
param.shortdescription: Drop all degenerate axes (e.g. Stokes and/or Frequency)?
param.description: Drop all degenerate axes (e.g. Stokes and/or Frequency)? Default: False Options: False|True

task.example: FOR MORE INFORMATION, SEE THE TASK PAGES OF EXPORTFITS IN CASA DOCS: https://casa.nrao.edu/casadocs/
